{{Wireless embedded system |brand=JAHT |model=WAM-4054P |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=Aceex |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip1_model=CX85510-12 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=conexant |default_ssid_regex=^conexant$ |default_ip=10.0.0.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=epicrouter |oui=00:05:B4 |oui_eth=00:05:B4 |default_ch= }} [http://www.farina1.com/jaht/page_01.htm JAHT WAM-4054P Wireless ADSL Modem/router setup (Conexant)]
[http://www.thinkbroadband.com/hardware/reviews/9-jaht.html Reviewed on ThinkBroadband] :"495-20605-02" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. The SoC used appears to be a '''Conexant''' AccessRunner (CX823??-??). [http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-J/JAHT/firmware/ JAHT firmware on m-h] The wireless interface may also have a 00:05:B4 OUI ('''Aceex''').
